meanings.definition: Make (something) more modern or up to date.
meanings.sent1: She updates her phone regularly to get the latest features.
meanings.sent2: He updates his wardrobe every season to stay fashionable.
meanings.sent3: The computer kept asking for updates, like a persistent reminder.
meanings.sent4: Her new haircut really updates her look, giving her a fresh appearance.
meanings.sent5: The software updates automatically, ensuring it is always current.

meanings.sent1: The latest updates to the app fixed many bugs and improved performance.
meanings.sent2: I always look forward to reading the morning news updates.
meanings.sent3: The updates to the recipe made it even more delicious.
meanings.sent4: The new edition of the book includes updates to the original content.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit showcases historical updates of famous paintings.

meanings.definition: The act of bringing something up to date.
meanings.sent1: The updates to the regulations ensure compliance with current laws.
meanings.sent2: She is responsible for the weekly updates to the project timeline.
meanings.sent3: The updates to the software were met with cheers from the team.
meanings.sent4: His updates to the presentation made it more engaging and informative.
meanings.sent5: The regular updates to the website keep it relevant and user-friendly.
